query: atrial fibrillation guidelines ESC AHA CCS amiodarone beta-blockers recommendations clinical practice first-line therapy
title: Cost-Effectiveness of Antiarrhythmic Drugs for Treating Paroxysmal or Persistent Atrial Fibrillation in China: An Economic Evaluation
authors: Fuming Li, Dunming Xiao, Yu Xia, Junling Weng, Shimeng Liu, Yingyao Chen
reference: Li, F., Xiao, D., Xia, Y., Weng, J., Liu, S., & Chen, Y. (2025). Cost-effectiveness of antiarrhythmic drugs for treating paroxysmal or persistent atrial fibrillation in China: An economic evaluation. Clinical Therapeutics. https://doi.org/Not available
